statements: SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM Customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE registered_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM Customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, registered_date FROM Customers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY registered_date DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, age, gender, city FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY first_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount >= 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender, city FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY city ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND city IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago') ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT customer_name, email, country FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, email, age, city, country FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, age, city FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_date, status FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND status = 'completed'
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, income, occupation FROM demographics WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
